About Me

Projects

01

DeepFake-Buster

A deepfake detection system that analyzes uploaded videos and identifies manipulated frames using a TensorFlow Lite model and OpenCV-based preprocessing. Built for real-time inference with a streamlined prediction pipeline.

PythonOpenCVTensorFlow Lite
02

Hyderabad-House-Price-Predictor

A machine learning model that predicts house prices in Hyderabad using real dataset preprocessing, feature engineering, and regression techniques. Includes a clean pipeline for training, evaluation, and result visualization.

PythonEDAData CleaningSKLearn
03

DLP-GUI

A cross-platform desktop application built with PyQt6 that provides a clean graphical interface for yt-dlp. Supports multi-threaded downloads, playlists, formats, subtitles, and modular architecture for future extensions.

PythonPyQt6yt-dlp
